GrindArea.Name: Grind to level 10 - Tomb of Naga Sadow

UserDialog.Title: Note From Metrienne
UserDialog.Message: There is a conversation with the monument that explicitly requires you to press [Shoot Lightning at it] in order to advance to the next step. Unfortunately, Buddy Wing cannot make specific choices while AutoSkip is enabled. Stop the profile, initiate the conversation and press 2 on your keyboard. Once the conversation is over, restart the profile. (Note: Stopping the profile closes this prompt)

UserDialog.Title: Note From Metrienne
UserDialog.Message: Bring down Overseer Tremel to 1%, initiate the conversation, then press OK.

UserDialog.Title: Note From Metrienne
UserDialog.Message: Buddy Wing has issues using the auto elevator. Get to the top floor, talk to Naman Fal, then come back down the elevator and press OK.

UserDialog.Title: Note From Metrienne
UserDialog.Message: Step forward to initiate the conversation. Bring down Khem Val to 1%, then press OK.
